response.overview: See a dragon kick James Balsamo in a pool, A famous pro-wrestler fights an interdimensional creature, and behold as a beautiful woman rubs crumbling muffins all over her naked body! This is  just some of the insanity you will see in "Mind Melters 27"! Mad Man director James Balsamo, brings you another gold mine of chaos! Packed to the brim with behind the scenes footage, celebrity promos, and weird action you won't get anywhere else but right here!
response.title: Mind Melters 27
